modName: TERA Weapons Collection - AttT Compatibility Patch
summary: The TERA Weapons Collection, now working with Armed to the Teeth! Mostly.
descriptionHtml:
[color=green][b]Description[/b][/color]
This mod adds functionality for Armed to the Teeth to all weapons in the TERA Weapons Collection mod except for shields and staves, the reason for this is somewhere below.

Any bugs found could you nicely send me a PM, I don\'t want to test this myself after all that form editing. I did test a couple swords and they worked so i know I\'m doing it right at least. 

Now I\'m not sure if i needed any permissions to make this as it doesn\'t actually contain any files from either mod, it just changes a load of forms, but i credited where due anyway. On with the description.

[color=green][b] Good News![/b][/color]
I got permission from Iromizu to edit the .nifs, now i just need EnMasse to let me actually upload the files :)

[color=red][b]IMPORTANT...[/b][/color] kinda
If you are using a weapon from the TERA Weapon Collection that was enchanted/upgraded before you installed this mod, you will have to remake the weapon and enchant it again before it will work. 

[color=red]Slightly less important[/color]
Shields and Staves will not work unless i can edit their nif files. To do this would mean hosting the shields and staves on this mod and according to nexus rules requires me to get permission from EnMasse Entertainment (and Iromizu ofc but I\'m sure he\'s a nice guy and would say yes). So Don\'t expect those to be here any time soon. One day maybe though.

PLEASE NO COMMENTS ABOUT bDisableGearedUp! It\'s a less efficient, lazy and overly buggy method of doing something which isn\'t hard in the first place. I won\'t stop you from commenting about it but i will copy paste my argument as to why AttT is better repeatedly. k bro?

____________________________________________________________________________________________

[b]Version History[/b]

[color=green]Version 1.0[/color]
Ok, so everything that will actually work is now done so i consider this a 1.0. Shields and staves will work one day, if i ever got permissions from EnMasse and Iromizu to host the files and change the .nifs respectively. Staves [i]are[/i] included in this one but they will not actually work.

[color=orange]Version 0.5[/color]
Staves! (Won\'t do anything until i get permission to edit the .nifs)

[color=orange]Version 0.4[/color]
Now with greataxes!
Added Leveled Lists

[color=orange]Version 0.3[/color]
Finished the bows.

[color=orange]Version 0.2[/color]
All 2H Swords now finished.

[color=orange]Version 0.1[/color]
All 1H swords that are actually swords (not the lances)

____________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=green][b]Requirements:[/b][/color]
This will, unsurprisingly, require both Armed to the Teeth and the TERA Weapons Collection mods.

AttT: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9614] Armed To The Teeth [/url]

TERA: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27463] TERA Weapons Collection [/url]

AttTTERAWeapons.esp needs to be below both in the load order /goobyplz

[color=yellow]Recommended:[/color]
Who needs lore friendly when you change it so much it BECOMES the lore?

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846] TERA Armors Collection For Skyrim [/url] (has optional leveled lists)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15143] Castanic or Highelf Style Idles For Females [/url]
____________________________________________________________________________________________

Creds:
+3 Awesome Score to Iromizu for the TERA Weapon Collection

+3 Awesome Score for the developers of AttT, awesome mod guys.

+5 Poo Brain to the guy who wrote the guide for custom AttT weapons. Because he got it wrong and now everyone mistakenly believes AttT is broken.
author: Dominoes666
